definitions.definition: A deity or supreme being ; a supernatural , typically immortal , being with superior powers , to which personhood is attributed.
examples: The most frequently used name for the Islamic god is Allah.

subdefinitions.definition: A representation of a deity, especially a statue or statuette .
( figurative ) Something or someone particularly revered, worshipped , idealized, admired and/or followed.

definitions.definition: ( figurative ) A person in a very high position of authority , importance or influence ; a powerful ruler or tyrant .
( figurative , informal ) A person who is exceptionally skilled in a particular activity.
examples: He is the god of soccer!

definitions.definition: ( figurative , informal ) An exceedingly handsome man.
examples: Lounging on the beach were several Greek gods .

definitions.definition: ( Internet , roleplaying games ) The person who owns and runs a multi-user dungeon .

main_definition: A deity or supreme being ; a supernatural , typically immortal , being with superior powers , to which personhood is attributed.
secondary_definitions: ( figurative ) A person in a very high position of authority , importance or influence ; a powerful ruler or tyrant .
( figurative , informal ) A person who is exceptionally skilled in a particular activity.
( figurative , informal ) An exceedingly handsome man.
( Internet , roleplaying games ) The person who owns and runs a multi-user dungeon .

main_definition: ( often derogatory , also philosophy ) Alternative letter-case form of God .
